RuleTerritory2Association.name: RuleTerritory2Association
RuleTerritory2Association.description: Represents a record-assignment rule and its association to an object, such as Account. Available if Sales Territories has been enabled.

IsInherited.description: Indicates whether the rule is an inherited rule (true) or a local rule (false). Rule inheritance flows from the parent territory where the rule is created to the ruleâ€™s descendent territories (if any) in the territory model hierarchy. A local rule is created within a single territory and affects that territory only.

Territory2Id.description: The ID of the territory where the rule was created.
